channel.title: [PI] ::yell
channel.description:
I was wondering if it was possible to make it so ::yell was only available for players that have played for more than 30 minutes. I don't like the idea of having it so only Donators+ can yell... I couldn't find a tutorial for this but if you have one please post a link.
Thanks!

item.title: [PI] ::yell
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote="[C"]oder link=topic=529237.msg3861269#msg3861269 date=1324685102]
Why dont you think this is a good idea?[/quote]

If you do this at all you should at least end it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ::yell
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

You could add a timer for regular players to only be able to yell every thirty seconds, that will take less hassle & code.

You can do it directly in the yell command.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ::yell
item.dc:creator: @_C_oder [C]oder
item.description:
@_C_oder wrote:

Why dont you think this is a good idea?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ::yell
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

I recommend you don’t implement this into your source. You can do this by making a timer and initiating it if the player is new. From there It’s as simple as adding a condition to the Yell method. Again, I advise against this, but It’s PI, so it can’t really get any worse.

Read full topic
